row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
:SET &UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS# = ''
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_GATEWAY_ID# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS#, '-g &UC4RB_AWS_GATEWAY_ID# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS#, '-i &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_NIC_ID# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS#, '-n &UC4RB_AWS_NIC_ID# ') :ENDIF
Write-Host Replacing route..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-replace-route.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# &UC4RB_AWS_ROUTE_TABLE_ID# -r &UC4RB_AWS_CIDR# &UC4RB_OPTIONAL_PARAMS#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^ROUTE -caseSensitive
[string]::join("`n", $output)
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to replace route exit 1 }
Write-Host "`nSuccessfully replace route"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.pre_process: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB :IF &UC4RB_AWS_GATEWAY_ID# = '' : IF &UC4RB_AWS_INSTANCE_ID# = '' : IF &UC4RB_AWS_NIC_ID# = '' : PRINT Invalid input: You must provide one of the following: a gateway ID, instance ID, or a network interface ID. : EXIT 1 : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
